name: Quiet Space
description:
Alone and isolated, floating through the quiet of space...

Until the alert. The one you never thought you’d hear: signs of life detected. Could it really be? Maybe. Better not get your hopes up. But you’ll never know unless you follow that signal.

Quiet Space is the second game created by Shannon Jahnel Lanktree and Sam Bunny. It was made in just under 11 days as part of the Major Jam: Isolation. Theme for the jam was 'isolation', whilst the limitation was 'there are no living things'.

Shannon Jahnel Lanktree
@syrupsprinkles, syrupsprinkles.com

Sam Bunny
@sambunny_, sambunny.com

Controls

Movement: W, A, S, D or arrow keys
Interact: Spacebar
